title: Smurfing is too common and in Dynamic Q just creates a bad enviroment
body:
Ranked as a soloQ player already feels uphill, not impossible, but quite difficult.


Now i understand that friends want to play with their friends, but why not normal mode? if your lower ranked friends are not climbing the ladder, chances are that's because they belong in that elo, you are not helping them by winning for them "free-boosting" you are actually making their ranked experience harder.

Lets say you "help" a friend go from bronze 1 to silver 2,1 or even gold 5. 

They have missed alot!, sure people rage in that elo,  they make mistakes and are arrogant. but you have denied your friend the chance to learn how to carry the game, how to win and more importantly how to understand the game and the strategy that comes with it.

Everyone has those games and thinks; 'wow, this guy is clearly boosted. he is so awful'.. Now don't deny it. you get mad at this person for losing you the match or feeding or whatever on your main account, well guess what. you are part of that problem in addition you are also placing your friend in that environment to receive abuse or worse. you are setting up your friend for failure, for abuse and for a negative experience in the game. and ultimately denying them the chance to become as good as you are.

Smurfing is not helping the server improve, you are killing it instead.
